ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.view

Class FragmentView

  • java.lang.Object
    • android.support.v4.app.Fragment
      • ca.cmput301f13t03.adventure_datetime.view.FragmentView
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    android.content.ComponentCallbacks, android.view.View.OnCreateContextMenuListener, ICurrentFragmentListener

    public class FragmentView
extends android.support.v4.app.Fragment
implements ICurrentFragmentListener
    View Accessed via MainView > Continue > ~Select Item~ or via MainView > BrowseView > StoryDescription > ~Play / Continue item ~

    Holds Horizontal filmstrip containing illustrations at top of page, story fragment text in the view, and an actions buttons at the bottom of the page.

    Author:
    James Finlay
